alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Johnson County through 345 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Hole In The Wall, or 11 miles west of Kaycee, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. Accumulation of hail is likely. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hole In The Wall. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 253 and 254, and near mile marker 258. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
